sentence:
…around their communities. Prices are going up, not just in America's  heartland, but across our great country.

Republican leadership today had a chance to authorize year-round E15,  a commonsense blend of ethanol and gasoline, but guess what. They  walked away from it again.

Instead, and I can tell you this for the farmers I represent, half  their income…

…Mr. Speaker, I thank Chairwoman Foxx for the  incredible work of the Rules Committee. I know we worked through the  night on something that is very important. That is ethanol--E15, to be  specific.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today on behalf of the farmers, families, and  small businesses in Iowa's Third District and, really, rural  communities across America…

…Cole for his leadership.

Now, I rise today on behalf of North Dakota farmers and rural  communities to support the step included in this measure to move  forward on year-round E15.

Farmers are hurting. Across the country, input costs and interest  costs are up. Our producers are also dealing with tariff pressures and  shifting markets, and at the same…
